channel.title: 508 server help please
channel.description: Hi. when i try and run my 508 source, or any one eles, no1 can connect but me on localhost, yes i am useing a 508 client ipchanger, please help me :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2009, 09:08:17 am[/size][hr]also.. when i run my 317 source it works :| dno why 508 wont :(

item.title: 508 server help please
item.dc:creator: @Micky-F Micky-F
item.description:
@Micky-F wrote:

RIGHT! to end all this. I USE A IP CHANGER CLIENT! when i put my ip in i cannot connect. when i dont put my ip in i can connect! got it?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server help please
item.dc:creator: @Simon2 Simon^
item.description:
@Simon2 wrote:

[quote=“Ash™, post:2, topic:260192”]LocalHost is for people that live near you.

So no1 else sent live near you wont connect -.-[/quote]
Idiot he didn’t say that no-one else can connect on local host, He just said no-one can connect apart from me but that’s on local host.
Can you stop attempting to be a smartasse on every thread, All the things you say are FAR from right.

Anyway, On topic.

  • Are you sure you have look at your portforwarding settings since you went on your 317?
  • Are you sure the people that are using a basic 508 client have changed the IP in client.java to your IP?

Read full topic
